Package adrenaline.client

Interface ClientAPI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Client
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientRMIWrapper, ClientSocketWrapper, ClientStub, RMIClientCommands, SocketClientCommands
    public interface ClientAPI
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The ClientAPI interface extends Remote,The Client interface will implements it , and the Socket/Rmi wrapper/commands will implements Client interface It will send/received the command from server and client

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void kick()
      To kick a client when he did nothing during the whole turn he have to do the reconnection to reconnect the server
      void setLobby​(java.lang.String lobbyID, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> nicknames)
      To send the lobbyID and players' nickname ArrayList from server terminal to client terminal
      void setNickname​(java.lang.String nickname)
      To send the current player's nickname from server terminal to client terminal
      void setPlayerColor​(java.lang.String nickname, Color color)
      Send the player color set value from server terminal to client terminal
      void timerStarted​(java.lang.Integer duration, java.lang.String comment)
      To remind the client timer start.
      void update​(UpdateMessage updatemsg)
      To send the update message from server terminal to client terminal
      void validSquaresInfo​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> validSquares)
      To send the valid squares from server terminal to client terminal
